200234.en:
Oh, no, oh, no, oh, no. You need an
Entry Permit to enter Urbea Empire
Castle!

200236.en:
This is a place of Divine Care Prayer.
Please be quiet.

200237.en:
I assume you are here to play pogbattle with Father Uzza. I have an interesting piece of information.
Whenever Father Uzza plays against a beginner in a pogbattle, he always plays pogs in the same order. The
first pog he gives out is a copper pog, I think.

200238.en:
In Urbea Underground City, the Church is also a government office that handles administrative matters. The
priest is like the mayor of the town.

200239.en:
Welcome, my fellow traveler. What can
I do for you?<yesno><case 1><close><case 2><break><case_cancel><break><case_end>

200240.en:
If you have any trouble, come visit me
anytime. Well then...<bw_break>

200241.en:
I see. So you were looking for someone with knowledge of the affairs of this country and you found me. I am Father
Uzza, but I am not a priest of the Church. In reality, I am a passionate pog butler! If you want to know more
about the Urbea Underground City, you will win me in the Urbeapogbattle!

200242.en:
I am a passionate pogbutler! If you want to know more about the Urbea Underground City, you can win me in
the Urbeapogbattle!

200243.en:
Hmm? You are short of Urbeapog. Put
one each of gold, silver and bronze in
your item bag and call out to me.

200244.en:
The rules of Urbeapogbattle are simple.Players play one pog at a time against each other. A gold pog is
stronger than a silver pog. The silver pog is strong against the copper pog. And the copper pog is strong against
the gold pog! In this way, the winner is decided by the three pogs. From now on, you must win all three of your
games against me. A draw is not a victory.

all three of your games against me. A draw is not a victory.

200258.en:
Well done on winning three in a row! You're pretty good, you know that? You're like the Ja Kuba of old! Cough,
cough, forget I said that. Now, what do you want to ask me?

200259.en:
Want to tell me about Urbea Underground City? Oh no! I'm not interested in that! I can't find the
silver Urbeapog! I'm sure it's somewhere in this house.Or I'm sure there's a silver Urbeapog somewhere in
the house! Then we'll talk about it!

200260.en:
Hohoho! Well done, my friend!It seems that you have been completely swept up in the atmosphere of the Imperial
City, haven't you? Well, that's understandable. The universal floating chairs that come and go, the highways,
the comfortable air-conditioning, the clean water supply. Especially since Prime Minister Guryan Rush started
utilizing geo-energy, life has become more convenient and comfortable. I'm going to take a sightseeing flight in
a large anti-gravity flying machine, and I'm going to do Oar with a pog. It's a luxury reserved for the upper
class. If Father Uzza hears about my all-night pog, he will give me a long lecture, and it will be troublesome.
I'll keep this between you and me!

200261.en:
The universal floating chairs that come and go, the highways, the comfortable air conditioning, the
clean water supply. Especially since Prime Minister Guryan Rush started to utilize geo-energy, every aspect of
life has become convenient and comfortable. I'm going to take a sightseeing flight in a large anti-
gravity flying machine, and I'm going to do Oar with a pog. It's a luxury reserved for the upper class. If
Father Uzza hears about my all-night pog, he will give me a long lecture, and it will be troublesome. I'll keep
this between you and me!

200262.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Oh my! Oh my goodness! Take me on a
trip with you <heart>

200263.en:
This is Luxury Jewelry Shop. Rare ores from selected mines are processed one by one by Juei Laer's hand. Our
products are sold only to the wealthy people of Urbea, so we are sorry, but we ask our customers to leave as soon
as possible.

200264.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Hey, hey, hey. Is that junk coming
soon?

200265.en:
To support my wife and six children, I work from morning to night in an oil refinery, and the only thing I enjoy
in life is Urbeapog.

200266.en:
Mwah. What about you? You want to tell me about Urbea Underground City? Yes, that's not the point! To support my
wife and 6 children, I work from morning till night in a refinery, and the only thing I enjoy in life is
Urbeapog! But when I buy a rare pog at a high price, what do I get? But when I bought a rare pog at a high price,
it was stolen by Guaardvark! I'm so disappointed! I hope someone can defeat him in Gatara Mountain Forest
and bring back the pog.

200267.en:
I bought a rare pog for a great price, and lo and behold, it was stolen by Guaardvark! Guaardvark stole it from
me! I'm so disappointed! I wonder if someone can defeat him in Gatara Mountain Forest and get the pog back.

200268.en:
What's this? The Convex Urbea Pog that he stole! You got it back? Thank you! The gizzard-rimmed pog was issued for
one year only, and is a very rare collector's item. There are often counterfeit ones out there. Father
Uzza catches anyone who makes a false pog and lectures them, but I wish there would be a more proper law. I'm
sure Guryan Rush will do it, right? He's Princess Ulta's guardian, but he's the one who really controls the
empire. We can't expect anything from a recluse like the princess. It's our Guryan Rush!

Father Uzza catches anyone who makes a false pog and lectures them, but I wish he would make a better law.
Guryan Rush would do it, wouldn't he? He's Princess Ulta's guardian, but he's the one who really controls the

Information input completed. Hmmm... Hmmm... NARUHODO. There is a possibility that additional
information may be obtained from pog lovers who exist on a different level. Let's try to find more pog lovers!

Information input completed. Hm-hm-hm, I see. 3 pog lovers' information is integrated. Analyzing. Please wait.
The person that the three of you have talked about in common.I've determined that the most influential person with
extensive connections and access to information is Father Uzza. Let's go to the Church in the middle of the
capital!

200272.en:
If you fail to pass, you will be reported to the police. In order to gain an audience with Princess Ulta,
it is imperative that we obtain an Entry Permit. In order to obtain an Entry Permit, it is necessary to find
a powerful person with a wide network of contacts and access to information. Urbeapog is very popular in the
capital.The most important people who are well-connected and well-informed are likely to be pog lovers. Urbeapog
is a disk-shaped piece of metal made of gold, silver, and copper, different from ordinary paper pog. It is very
popular among pog lovers in the Imperial City. Let's look for pog lovers in the Imperial Capital!

Information gathering in the Imperial Capital is complete. I have obtained many results. Thank you very much.
Princess Ulta hates people. It's going to take a lot of effort to gain her trust. The source of information for
the Entry Permit is Princess Ulta's demon machine. I'll search around the plaza!

200279.en:
In Urbea, as an adult you can get a license for the universal levitation chair. The underground empire is so
big, but since access to anti-gravity equipment is restricted, I can't even go shopping without one.

200280.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Hehe pog pog. A little work and you
can sell them for a lot. Stupid
Urbeans, it's a small business!

200281.en:
I own several houses on the lower level, and this is one of the houses I rent out. I have to stock up for my
old age.

200282.en:
I finally got my license after the 5th retest! I am now a member of the adult companion. I used to be a bit of a
rascal. It was my sweet summer when I bought a universal floating chair and drove off without a license.

200283.en:
Here, here, here. The lower you go in Urbea Underground City, the more dirty air tends to accumulate. It used to be
worse, but His Majesty Ja Kuba and Guryan Rush took measures and it's much better now.

200284.en:
Most of the people hanging around the back alley are Gateria refugees who fled their hometowns or the
battlefields. Well, I'm one of them. I'm just scraping by, fixing up junk that the Urbeans throw away. I'm
miserable, but I'll do anything to survive.
200284.ja:
ã€Œè·¯åœ°è£ã‚’ã‚¦ãƒ­ã¤ã„ã¦ã‚‹ã®ã¯ã€€ã ã„ãŸã„ãŒ ã€€æ•…éƒ·ã‚„æˆ¦å ´ã‹ã‚‰é€ƒã’ã¦ããŸã€€ã‚¬ãƒ†ãƒªã‚¢é›£æ°‘ã ãœã€‚ ã€€ã¾ã‚ã€€ã‚ªãƒ¬ã‚‚ã€€ãã†ã ã‘ã©ãªâ€¦â€¦ã€‚

200285.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>I can't wait to see how the junk's
maze beam makes me feel!

200286.en:
There is a vast city spreading endlessly beneath the Gatara Mountain Forest! Recently, a large housing area
has been built at the base of the volcano. How does it feel to sleep next to Magma Blast?

200287.en:
This machine is Aztech Support Mech No. 022. The administrator of this machine is waiting for the purchase of
good quality mud and plans to return to the Aristocratic District. The reason why the administrator of this
machine purchased mud is that covering the whole body with mud will increase the beauty moisturizing effect and
improve the level of self- satisfaction.

200288.en:
Welcome to Urbea Underground City. We welcome you, travelers. This is the imperial capital of the vast
underground empire.It is divided into three levels: the lower level, the middle level and the upper level.

200289.en:
There is no abnormality in the middle level! Urbea's castle gate exists here in the capital. Security has been
strengthened in other areas.

200290.en:
Lower level patrol is on alert. We have confirmed an influx of refugees in this level. Please do not approach
the back alley.

200291.en:
There is nothing wrong with the upper level. There are many wealthy people living in this level. We have a
request to patrol carefully.

200292.en:
We are a royal tailor.I have orders directly from Guryan Rush! The charismatic man of the empire is a
walking advertisement tower, so we've been inundated with orders and we're swamped. I'm sorry for the general
public.

200294.en:
<pc> gave Tsutebaku one Urbea
Copper Coin!

200299.en:
<pc> received a set of pogues
tarta!<se_nots System 7>

200301.en:
<pc> gave Fufumama one Urbea
Silver Coin!

200303.en:
Would you give Convex Urbea Pog to
Quack?<yesno><break>

200304.en:
<pc> gave Quack a Convex
Urbea Pog!

200305.en:
Terrible giants appeared and burned Gateria. Even those who survived were hunted down by the demon soldiers and
died jumping into the sea and lava. I escaped from Gateria with my sister and found myself here. I don't want to
go through that again.

200306.en:
I came to the Imperial City for the first time because Anchan got a wife from the city, but I got dizzy in the
middle of nowhere! I can't keep up with Peid in the city. I'd be better off living in Ezesol making salt.

200307.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Don't beat yourself. I didn't do
anything wrong.

200308.en:
Having destroyed Gateria, the Urbea Underground City has finally gained control of almost all of the Dwachakka
Continent. The small nation of Dolworm remains in the Goble Desert, but it belongs to neither Gateria nor Urbea,
and it lives in hiding, its entire castle buried in the sand. It's only a matter of time before Urbea unifies
the world. Ha-ha-ha.

200309.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Have you heard of Urbeapog?It's all
the rage here in the capital.

200310.en:
Ah. You're an aboriginal, aren't you? Shall I kindly tell you a little bit about Urbea? But..! No free stuff!
I'll teach you if you give me one copper Urbeapog.
200310.ja:
ã€Œã‚ã£ã€‚ãŠå‰ã€€ãŠã®ã¼ã‚Šã•ã‚“ã ãªãƒ¼ï¼Ÿ ã€€è¦ªåˆ‡ãªã‚ªãƒ¬ãŒã€€ã¡ã‚‡ã³ã£ã¨ã ã‘ ã€€ã‚¦ãƒ«ãƒ™ã‚¢ã®ã“ã¨ã€€æ•™ãˆã¦ã‚„ã‚ã†ã‹ãƒ¼ï¼Ÿ

200311.en:
Woohoo! Thanks a lot! I've been really into Urbeapog lately, but my allowance is really tight. Heh heh heh. I'll
tell you about Urbea as promised! The one thing that can't be said enough about this country is its former
emperor, His Majesty Ja Kuba! You can see the beautiful streets of Urbea, which were built by his majesty. He
thought of us all and wanted us to live in prosperity and peace! We all loved him so much. But because of
Gateria... I can't forgive them! Guryan Rush destroyed Gateria and took His Majesty's place. I guess justice
will prevail in the end! That's all for the aborigines! Okay, now that we have Urbeapog, let's challenge Father
Uzza to a game of pog!

200312.en:
This town was built by His Majesty Ja Kuba, the former emperor, for everyone to live in prosperity and peace
forever! We all loved His Majesty. But because of Gateria, His Majesty... I can't forgive them! Guryan Rush
destroyed Gateria and took His Majesty's place. I guess justice will prevail in the end! That's all for
now! Now that we have Urbeapog, let's challenge Father Uzza to a game of pog!

200313.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Hmmm.I doubt if there is any other
country in the world as prosperous as
Urbea Underground City!

you want.

200316.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>One copper Urbeapog costs 120 gold.
Would you like to buy one?<yesno><break>

200318.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>One silver Urbeapog costs 600 gold.
Would you like to buy one?<yesno><break>

200320.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>One gold Urbeapog costs 2400 gold.
Would you like to buy one?<yesno><break>

200322.en:
The pogstarta set contains one gold, one silver, and one bronze for 3,000 gold. That's a bargain. Want to buy
one?

200324.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Oops, not enough money to buy that
one.<bw_break>

200325.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Oops, looks like I can't hold it any
longer. Come back and buy some more
after you've sorted it out.

200326.en:
It is a pog lover's custom to have a copy of each type of pog, just in case something happens. Please come again
anytime.

200327.en:
I went on a trip around the five continents the other day, and I have to say, I found the Ogreed Continent
to be a very barbaric place! The fashion is wild and full of animal skins, without a shred of ingenuity!
Is it a shame to live in Kunai? How beautiful and refined our Urbea civilization is! Dwarfs have won
again.
200327.ja:

200328.en:
Look at the breathtaking scenery spread out below you! Even if thousands of years pass, this splendor
will be remembered forever.

200329.en:
This area is a residential area, and at certain times of the day, the main street is crowded with commuters in
their all-purpose floating chairs. I hate living in the city. But I want to buy a high-rise house for my frail
wife, so I'll do my best.

200330.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Oh, please don't talk to me. I'm your
wife's caretaker. I'm just a stone's
throw away.

200331.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Woohoo! Oh, my dear Chaicha! You look
beautiful today <heart>!

200332.en:
Because the upper and middle class people litter the alleyway with their unwanted stuff, Gateria refugees have
taken up residence there. I feel bad every time I pass by them.

200333.en:
Oh, no, oh, no, oh, no. You need an
Entry Permit to enter Urbea Empire
Castle!

200336.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>You know, my dad says that because the
princess is a junk, Marich is a junk
too!

200337.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>The beam was fun! I want to play with
Marich again!

200338.en:
Entry Permit was recovered for
<pc> by Aztech Guard No. 054!

200339.en:
I can still see it flickering in front of my eyes. I'm going to file a complaint with the castle the next
time that demonic machine comes!

200340.en:
I don't know why, but it seems that the Princess's Demon Goddess machine is not equipped with a language
function. Even security guards can speak nowadays.

200341.en:
I wonder if the Princess is still looking for someone. Why don't you help busy Guryan Rush-sama instead of
playing with your magical machine forever?

200342.en:
We are a royal tailor. I get orders directly from that Guryan Rush! Guryan Rush is a human. The tailor in Urbea
could only make clothes for Dwarfs, so he was in a lot of trouble. That's why he asked me, a returnee from
Lendersia, to help him out. I remember in my sweet summer days how many times I had to re-tailor the clothes for the
fashionable Guryan Rush. Even now, I deliver one dress every month!

200343.en:
The other day, I went on a trip around the five continents, and I felt that the Wena Islands are a very tactless
place! Well, not so much the land, but mostly the sea! The women grilling fish on the beach are disgusting, and
the men wandering around naked is disgusting. I am disgusted by the beauty and sophistication of our Urbea
civilization. Dwarfs have won again.
200343.ja:

200344.en:
Princess Ulta has asked for your help in helping the Gateria refugees. As the Church, we cannot overlook the
harsh conditions they are facing in the lower back alley. Of course, we would like to help.

200345.en:
It is my duty to save the lost and
spread the Urbeapog, no matter who
governs the empire. Now...<bw_break>

200346.en:
I heard that after the death of Guryan Rush, there is a move to regulate geo- energy. It's a terrible thing! I just
hate to think of living without the universal floating chair and air conditioning. I am against the
regulation!

200347.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>My dad said that Princess Ulta is
working hard behind the scenes, so
Marich is busy behind the scenes too!

200348.en:
Because of Guryan Rush, Urbea has destroyed innocent Gateria. The people of Urbea are all pacifists. Princess
Ulta is doing her best to save the poor Gateria refugees and prisoners. She is our Princess Ulta after all!

200349.en:
The Princess has sent word to the people and told them the truth about the emperor's assassination. Guryan
Rush is such a horrible man! He assassinated His Majesty Ja Kuba, blamed the Prince of Gateria, took
over the empire, and did such a terrible thing. He's a monster! I can't think of anything else.

200350.en:
Guryan Rush, you son of a bitch! My daughter was burned by Urbea Colossus. Even after he's dead, I'm still pissed
off. I'm going to work on my hehepog and take it out of the stupid Urbea people's pockets!

200351.en:
Guryan Rush has got us all fooled. We who respected him look like fools, don't we? I heard that the princess
took him down. He's not much older than me. I'm starting to like you!
200351.ja:
ã€Œã‚°ãƒ«ãƒ¤ãƒ³ãƒ©ã‚·ãƒ¥ã«ã¯ã€€ã¾ã‚“ã¾ã¨ãƒ€ãƒã•ã‚ŒãŸã‚ˆã€‚ ã€€ã‚ã„ã¤ã‚’å°Šæ•¬ã—ã¦ãŸã€€ã‚ãŸã—ãŸã¡ãŒ ã€€ãƒã‚«ã¿ãŸã„ã˜ã‚ƒãªã„ã‹ã„ï¼

200352.en:
Here, here, here. The lower you go in Urbea Underground City, the more dirty air tends to accumulate. It used to be
worse, but His Majesty Ja Kuba and Guryan Rush took countermeasures and it's much better now. So, even though
I know the truth, I don't think Guryan Rush is a very bad person.
200352.ja:

200353.en:
Guryan Rush's death won't change anything. We'll still be snobs, and we'll still have to pick up trash to
survive. My brother wrote me a letter saying he was going to be a soldier against Urbea, and that was it. I'm
sure he's already in the other world.

200354.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Do you want to play behind me? Then
you might meet Marich!

200355.en:
Guryan Rush was a monster! I see. They can do such diabolical things without a care in the world, can't they? We
were all deceived by the monster, weren't we? I was against the war with Gateria from the very beginning.

200356.en:
This machine is Aztech Support Mech No. 022. The administrator of this machine is waiting for the purchase of
a good quality Druserin and plans to return to the Aristocratic District. The reason why the administrator of
this machine purchases Dorcerin is that there is a trend toward the regulation of geo-politics. In
anticipation of high demand for Dorserin, they purchased this machine.

200358.en:
Terrible giants appeared and burned Gateria. Even those who survived were hunted down by demon soldiers and died
jumping into the sea or lava. I've fled Gateria with my sister, but I can't stand such a city full of false
good guys. I'm going to leave for somewhere far away.

200359.en:
I came to the Imperial City for the first time to get a wife from the city, but I got dizzy in the middle of
nowhere! And what's more, a very important person defeated a very important person? Wow, this is a very
dangerous world. I can't keep up with the city peids. Living in Ezesol making salt would be better suited for
me.

200360.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>People in town have been a little
nicer to me lately. Did something good
happen?

200361.en:
Having destroyed Gateria, the Urbea Underground City has finally gained control of almost all of the Dwachakka
Continent. The small nation of Dolworm remains in the Goble Desert, but it belongs to neither Gateria nor Urbea,
and it lives in hiding, its entire castle buried in the sand. It was only a matter of time before Urbea would
have united the country, but now that Guryan Rush is gone, it's only a matter of time.
200361.ja:

200362.en:
The person who assassinated His Majesty Ja Kuba was Guryan Rush! I heard he was a bad monster! Prince
Byan wasn't so bad! It's a good thing that Gateria didn't perish too! Damn monsters! Fight in the pogbattle!
200362.ja:
ã€Œã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ»ã‚¯ãƒé™›ä¸‹ã‚’ã€€æš—æ®ºã—ãŸçŠ¯äººã¯ ã€€ã‚°ãƒ«ãƒ¤ãƒ³ãƒ©ã‚·ãƒ¥æ§˜ã ã£ãŸã‚“ã ã£ã¦ï¼ ã€€ãªã‚“ã‹ã€€æ‚ªã„é­”ç‰©ã ã£ãŸã‚‰ã—ã„ããƒ¼ã€‚

200363.en:
Princess Ulta is really talented, isn't she? She was the first to realize Guryan Rush's true nature and
condemned him with her own hands, wasn't she? Her acting a little strange, like hiding out and looking
for someone, was all an act. In fact, it seems he was looking for an opportunity to strike back!

200364.en:
The other day I went on a trip around the five continents, and I found Eltona Continent to be a very insular
place! When you go into a room, you're told to take off your shoes, and when you go into the woods, you're told to
wash and cleanse yourself, as if Dwarf were a mud sling! How beautiful and refined we Urbea civilization are!
Dwarf has won again.
200364.ja:

200365.en:
Look at the breathtaking scenery spread out below you! Thousands of years may pass, but the glory of this
place will be remembered forever. Yes, with the name of His Majesty the peace-loving Ja Kuba and his beloved
daughter Princess Ulta! I don't know anything about Guru.

200366.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I don't know anything difficult.
However, I am troubled that your
wife's cheery is not good.

200367.en:
We, the general public, are not to blame! It's all the fault of the Princess and Guryan Rush who seduced
us. Right? I can't even walk down the back alley without feeling like the Gateria refugees are going to get
revenge on me after they find out the truth.

200368.en:
I went on a trip around the five continents the other day, and if you want to ask me what it was like on
each continent, I'm a rich man and I can tell you! Which continent do you want to hear about? Ogreed Continent Wena Islands Eltona Continent Pukuland Continent Never heard of
200368.ja:

200370.en:
I'm getting the feeling that Ogreed Continent is a very barbaric place! A wild, beast-skinned, fashionable place
without a shred of ingenuity! Is it a shame to live in Kunai? How beautiful and refined our Urbea civilization is!
Dwarfs have won again.

200371.en:
I have a feeling that the Wena Islands is a very tactless place! It's not really a land, it's more like an
ocean!The women grilling fish on the beach is repulsive, and the men wandering around naked is disgusting.
I am disgusted by the beauty and sophistication of our Urbea civilization. Dwarfs have won again.

200372.en:
I'm finding Eltona Continent to be a very insular place! When you go into a room, you're told to take off your
shoes, and when you go into the woods, you're told to wash and cleanse yourself, as if Dwarf were a mud
sling! How beautiful and refined we Urbea civilization are! Dwarf has won again.

200373.en:
I have found Pukuland Continent to be a very annoying place! When I walk around town, Pukulipo gather around
and try to make me laugh with their crude one-liners! Stop it! I'll never make it to the Sobering Slap in time!
How beautiful and sophisticated we Urbea civilization are! Dwarf has won again.

200866.en:
We are a royal tailor. I had received an order directly from that Guryan Rush. And yet, I never thought that
Mr. Guryan Rush would turn out like that. And on top of that, Mr. Pen head researcher is missing too! It's a
shame~, because the dress I made for Mr. Penhead was a design of my heart, with a vivid red and green color
scheme. Would you please find a suitable replacement for Master Penhead? I feel sorry for the outfit
as it is!

200867.en:
That's the way it should be! We already have a good idea of what we're looking for! Mr. Chukaka, Mr. Pacal,
and Mr. Tsondem, these three researchers at the Empire Tech Agency's first office are the ones I
want you to look into. All of them are working as chiefs of the magical machine development department, so I
think they would be great candidates to be the next head of the Pen. I want each of the three to wear the Top
Researcher Suit and capture their appearance on film. Thank you!

I want you to find a suitable
replacement for Mr. Penhead! I don't
want to see those clothes go to waste!<open_irai><bw_break>

200872.en:
We have three PI's at the Empire Tech Agency, Mr. Chukaka, Mr. Pacal, and Mr. Tsondem, who are in the first
building of the Empire Tech Agency. I would like each of them to wear the Top Researcher Suit and have them
photographed. Thank you very much!

We've been waiting for you! Did you
get the three PI's on tape?

Oh, no, not yet? I hope you can find
someone who fits that dress.

200875.en:
Oh, you only have one? I beg your pardon? The other two turned you down? Oh, dear! How rude of them! They have
no idea what an honor it is to be allowed to wear this dress! We don't want such rudeness! I'm sure that the
person in this photo-true is qualified for the Top Researcher Suit. I'll have a look at it right away.

200876.en:
Well! What is it? This picture true! It bears no resemblance to the pen- headed researcher! My clothes would
cry if they were worn by such a person! After all, it's not so easy to find someone who can replace Mr.
Penhead. At the very least, it would be nice if there was someone somewhere who has the same races as you.

200877.en:
<icon_exc>If you take a closer look, you'll see
that it's not human! I'd like you to
try on this dress!

200878.en:
Oh My! It suits you very well! The face looks somewhat like Mr. Penhead's, and from a distance you
could easily mistake him for someone else! I'm so pleased to see you wearing it so splendidly and so
chicly! It's the best thing for a tailor!

200879.en:
You'll never find anyone who looks better in this dress than you do. I have made my decision! From now on, no
matter who becomes the head pen researcher, I will not have you wear this dress. Thank you for your help. I
would like you to accept this in return!

200880.en:
I'm satisfied. I'll sell these clothes
to you for as much as you want. I'd
like you to come!

200881.en:
After all, it's not so easy to find
someone to replace Mr. Penhead.<open_irai><bw_break>

200882.en:
It would be nice if there was at least
one researcher somewhere who shares
the same races as Mr. Penhead.

I promised to sell you the Top

200952.en:
I am deeply moved! The vending machine that I spent my personal fortune to develop has finally been completed.
Probably the first of its kind in the world! Gahaha!

200953.en:
It appears to be a machine that sells
books. But apparently you can't buy
them with gold.

200954.en:
The lack of exercise has become a social problem recently because of the universal floating chairs. That's why
we developed a vending machine that sells books. I developed this vending machine with my own money and made a
lot of money! At the same time, it solves a social problem! Would you like to hear how it works?

200955.en:
Is that right? I'm itching to talk to
someone, but I'm not a fool enough to
talk to someone who isn't interested.

200956.en:
Let me explain. The books sold at the vending machines all have a story that makes me want to read the rest of the
book. But if you want to read the rest, you have to go to the vending machines outside the capital to buy
them. The places where the vending machines are located are not well- developed places that can be accessed
with a universal floating chair, but are all uncharted areas where you have no choice but to use nature and your
feet! The desire to read more puts people in a situation where they have no choice but to exercise. And the
product sells. Gahaha!

200957.en:
It is a vending machine selling books. Among the books for sale is Weekly Urbea Aztech Vol. 1. Would you like to
purchase Weekly Urbea Aztech Vol. 1 using the Magnet Book Purchase Tag?

200958.en:
<pc> received Weekly Urbea
Aztech Vol. 1 (Key Item).<me 60> Urbea Aztech Weekly has 6 volumes.
Let's look for the missing volume!

201355.en:
Sama, are you listening? I need an Entry Permit to gain an audience with Princess Ulta. In order
to obtain an Entry Permit, we need to find a powerful person who is well- connected and well-informed. Searching
for the best solution to find a well- connected and well-informed person Searching for the best solution Search
results Urbea style pog. It is currently very popular in the capital. Urbea pog is currently very popular in
the capital. Urbeapog is a disc-shaped piece of metal made of gold, silver, and copper, different from ordinary
paper pog. It uses a unique ro-ro-ru- ru method of play, and is very popular amongst pog lovers in the Imperial
City. Let's look for pog lovers in the Imperial Capital!

house to in the past.

202875.en:
Whoa! All right. I'll tell you what! You know, I was just saying the Lassiter's Lassiter's Lassiter's
Lassiter's Lassiter's Lassiter's Lassiter's Lassiter's Lassiter!

202876.en:
It was about 10 years ago. Suddenly, two broke people came to the capital. I lent them my empty house as a favor.
One was a young Guryan Rush, and the other was a boy by the name of who could do some kind
of mysterious trick. So when they said they were out of work, I introduced them to the chores at Church. Father
entrusted them with various things, and they turned out to be very useful. Their work became well known
throughout the capital, and they ended up working at the castle. They moved out of my rental house.

202877.en:
When we left, he generously left us a huge sum of money as a thank-you for renting the house to us, who knew
nothing about us. I know people say a lot of things about young people nowadays, but it feels good to see a
young person with a dream. I was happy to be able to help them! Father Uzza at Church knows a lot more about those
kids back then, so if you're interested, you can ask him.

202885.en:
The rules of pogbattle are simple. Each player competes by placing one pog at a time. A gold pog is stronger
than a silver pog. The silver pog is stronger than the copper pog. And the copper pog is strong against the gold
pog! In this way, the winner is decided by the three pogs. This time, let's make it a one-time true sword
fight! Can you beat the real me? Let's go!

202894.en:
Oh, I'm serious. I can't believe you beat me! I haven't seen such a hot competition in a long time. Your
strength is truly amazing! All right! Now let me tell you everything I know about the old Guryan Rush. Guryan Rush
and his partner , who was penniless at the time, started helping me to pay the rent on Oyaya's
house. So I gave them the job of solving the problems of people who came to Church for help, and they
solved more and more difficult problems and became well known all over the city. The combination of
Guryan Rush, who came up with solutions on the spot, and , who did it with
uncanny skill, was quite brilliant. I thought it would be a shame to let them end up as servants, so I
introduced them to His Majesty Ja Kuba, who had come secretly to play pog. His Majesty, seeing their talent,
took them up to the castle, and from that moment on they became apprentices to the priests of the castle.

202914.en:
The malfunction of your Sound Recorder was caused by the gear inside the machine wearing down and becoming
misaligned. You can get this Heat- Proof Gear by defeating <%sev_que_name0> in Burning Lava Cave,
so please go and get a new one.

202915.en:
Hey, did you get the Heat-Proof Gear? I've been doing a lot of tedious janitorial work over here. I'll fix it
for free for a change.

202916.en:
What, you haven't done it yet? Your Sound Recorder can be fixed as soon as you have the Heat-Proof Gear, so get
it here as soon as possible.

202917.en:
Whoa...you received Heat-Proof Gear! You received Heat-Proof Gear? Well then, I'll start repairing your
recorder as soon as I can, to take the edge off!

202918.en:
Ahhhh! Guryan Rush? You're checking up on that son of a bitch? I've got something to say! I'm sure you'll find
my opinion valuable! Let me talk to him about Guryan Rush! Come on, man.

202919.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>I have a lot of beef with Guryan Rush!
It's not fair to give him all the good
stories. Hey, listen!<yesno><break>

202920.en:
Okay, then, let me tell you my story. I am from Gateria and came to this country as a young man to learn the
art of Urbea. During my training here, the war broke out and I have seen what Guryan Rush is capable of, he is the
worst son of a bitch! He attacked my home, the beautiful Gateria, with the Urbea Colossus and destroyed it in the
blink of an eye! I still have no contact with my brother who remained in the country. I guess he's not alive
anymore. Damn! What did Gateria do? If I could, I would take Guryan Rush with my own hands.

202921.en:
Would you give Pocomam the Heat-Proof
Gear?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

202922.en:
<pc> gave Pocomam the Heat-
Proof Gear!

202923.en:
When I switched on the Sound Recorder
and played back the audio, Father
Uzza's recorded voice began to play!

202924.en:
<pipipi_low>All right! Then I will tell you
everything I know about the old Guryan
Rush.

202925.en:
Pocomam's story seems to have been recorded perfectly on the Sound Recorder! I'd better get back to
Kikimimi!

202926.en:
Guryan Rush has waged war on my home kingdom of Gateria, attacking and annihilating it in the process! He is
a demon in human form. I hope you will record the fact that all the people of Gateria hate him.

202976.en:
I'm sorry, but I'm working on some troublesome repairs right now. If you want to talk, we can talk later.
That's strange. Why isn't it working?

202977.en:
Hey, it's you again. I've been very busy lately, but I finally found some free time. So, what do you want from
me?

202978.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>What, you don't have anything to do?If
you have a broken machine, bring it to
me.

202979.en:
This is another broken Sound Recorder.And it's a very old model. It's so old, it'll take more work than
last time to fix it. But I'll fix it after listening to you complain about Guryan Rush. I feel much better now
that I have that thing. From the looks of it, this malfunction is caused by old, worn-out wiring inside and a
broken magnetic tape. First, get me some Strong Mustache from Gatara Mountain Forest <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> to
use as wiring, and some Magma Solution from Chaldea Lava Belt <%sEV_QUE_NAME1>. Chaldea Lava Belt or
something. That should fix it! Oops! I should warn you that <%sEV_QUE_NAME1> is usually hiding in the ground and is
never seen, so be careful when looking for him. So please be careful!

202980.en:
Shall I show Pocomam the Sound
Recorder I picked up at Guryan Rush's
old haunt?<yesno><close>

202981.en:
From the looks of it, the problem with the Sound Recorder is that the wiring inside it is old and worn out, and the
magnetic tape is broken. First, get me a Strong Mustache from Gatara Mountain Forest <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> to use as
wiring, and a Magma Solution from Chaldea Lava Belt <%sEV_QUE_NAME1>. Chaldea Lava Belt or something. That
should fix it! Oops! I should warn you that <%sEV_QUE_NAME1> is usually hiding in the ground and is never
seen, so be careful when looking for him. So please be careful!

202982.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Hey, did you get Strong Mustache and
Magma Solution? With that, I think I
can fix that Sound Recorder.

202983.en:
What the heck. You haven't done it yet? I'm the only one who can fix a breakdown that bad. Bring me the tools
while I'm still free.

202984.en:
Oh, I see you got it all! Now it's time to show off my skills. I'll show you that there is no machine that I
can't fix!

202985.en:
We just need to oil the whiskers, replace the dented wires, and then dissolve the broken tape ends with
Magma Solution and stick them back together.

202986.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>All right! It's fixed! From the looks
of it, the magnetic tape inside is
intact. Let's see if it works or not.

202987.en:
I've heard that voice before!Could it be Guryan Rush's voice? Is this a record of Guryan Rush before he came
to the capital? He was separated from his family and struggling desperately just to see them again? That's what
caused that war. I would do anything if I could see my only brother Pokomuchi again. Yes, as long as he's
alive.
202987.ja:

202988.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr><icon_exc>What's that? Pokomuchi!That's
definitely him! That's my brother!
He's alive in Daraz Large Vein?<bw_break>

202989.en:
Would you give Pocomam Strong Mustache
and Magma Solution?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

202990.en:
<pc> gave Pocomam Strong
Mustache and Magma Solution!

202991.en:
Pocomam switched on the Sound Recorder and played back the audio! Then a familiar male voice started playing
from the Sound Recorder.

202992.en:
I drifted through time and found myself in this hole in the ground. Not knowing where I was, I wandered around
to find a watering hole to survive, and picked berries to stave off my hunger. I wandered around, but time
just kept passing, and when I couldn't bear the solitude any longer, I found lying outside the hole
in the cave. I took care of , and after talking to him, I found out that he was a time
castaway just like me. The companionship I gained in my solitude was very reassuring. I told
about my situation, and agreed to help me reunite with in order to
reunite me with my sister. We leave the cave and set off for some town to fulfill our great ambition. The
challenges ahead will be extraordinary. But I, Quard and , will make it through.
I leave my resolution here so that I will not forget my original intention.

202993.en:
told Pocomam that it was a former POW named Pokomuchi who told him the location of this Old Sound
Recorder!

202994.en:
Thanks for letting me know! Now I have to go see Pokomuchi and let him know I'm alive too! I owe it all to you for
your coverage! You should also thank the guy who wrote the article about Guryan Rush!

202995.en:
Thanks to you, I have reunited with my brother Pokomuchi in Daraz Large Vein! Thanks for the tip! I still hate
Guryan Rush, but now that I know he misses his family, I don't hate him as much as I used to.

203064.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Thank you very much! By the way, you
have a visitor. I know this is sudden,
but could you do me a favor?<yesno><break>

203065.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Too bad. We look forward to seeing you
again!

203066.en:
Wow, I'm so happy! I'm asking for a favor regarding the new letter paper that I'm going to start selling here
at Post Office. As a matter of fact, the letter paper is not selling at all, and if this situation continues,
Post Office is in danger of closing down. So I thought about why they are not selling well. Probably because of
the technology of this country. It is faster and more convenient than recording your voice in a machine, or
asking a magical machine to send a message, or writing a letter, right? I can't talk about how nice it is to
write letters. First of all, we need to get people to buy letter paper! That's why we decided to make the
design of the letter paper to suit your taste. Gear Paper! I heard that you can get a paper-thin gear called
Compact Gear by defeating the <%sev_que_name0> monster in Gatara Mountain Forest and so on. We put the
gear on the letter paper and grab the hearts of Dwarfs who love mechas! I am sure it will sell like hotcakes. So,
please, could you go and get Compact Gear? Of course, we'll give you a chance to give away the finished
letterhead!
203066.ja:

203067.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Really? I'm so happy! I'm so happy!
Then, I'll be waiting for it with
pleasure!

203068.en:
Really? I did it! What is it? Are you sure you're not taking on too many jobs? That's no good! You're too busy.
I'll be waiting for you, so don't worry! Please come back when you are free!

203069.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Hmmm, too bad. Please come back if you
change your mind!

203070.en:
Yup! Hey there, to the Post Office! How may I help you today? I'm sorry. It's been a while since I've had a
visitor, so I was a bit in a rush. I'll see you later.

203071.en:
Thank you very much! And, Sir, don't
forget your promise to get the Compact
Gear.<open_irai><bw_break>

203072.en:
Compact Gear can be obtained by
defeating <%sev_que_name0> monster in
Gatara Mountain Forest!

203073.en:
Ah, you have a visitor! Did you bring
what I asked for by any chance?

203074.en:
Well then, I guess I'll have to buy
some letter paper. Let's see...<bw_break>

203075.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Wow, thank you very much! I'm going to
build Compact Gear and make Gear Paper
right away!

203076.en:
Phew! It's amazing! It's a masterpiece! Here you go, Urbea Underground City's limited edition
local stationery!

203077.en:
The rotating gears that can be glimpsed from the top of the model will grab the heart of Dwarfs who love
mechanical devices! We are sure it will sell like hotcakes. The spinning ear has no function, but the first
step is to get people interested in it. That is the first step in our sales strategy! We were also
particular about the design of the letter paper. I used Princess Ulta as the motif to represent Dwarf's love of
mecha. Gear Paper will be available exclusively at the Post Office as soon as possible! We look forward to seeing
you again soon.

203078.en:
Listen up, customers! Gear Paper was sold immediately! Dwarf, who bought the letter paper, was very impressed
with the thinness of the gear when he took it apart on the spot. He wanted to show it to his friends! He sent a
letter from the Post Office with a message on the Gear Paper. The first step of our sales strategy is
perfection! I will do my best to make them more interested in our products. I will try my best to get more people
interested in our products.

203748.en:
Hey there. This is junk storage. Worn- out gears, filleted shafts. A graveyard of useless, broken parts.
But you know what, these junks are hard workers who have done their best for the Imperial City. They can still
work! I think they are saying that. I don't think they can carry people like elevator or fight like the demon
soldiers anymore. But there's something I want to make with the junks that were thrown away here. So,
I was wondering if I could ask you to help me.

lens makers have been drafted into the Empire Tech Agency because of the war with Gateria, so there is no one who
can make lenses. That's why I want you to get the lenses. I'll be waiting for you with the junks.

master and Ryuta.

203903.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr><icon_exc><turn_pc>Thank God master and Ryuta are safe. I
had a bad feeling this time. This is
for you. Please accept it.

203904.en:
But still... Deirdre. I never dreamed that the day would come when I would actually bring them to you. Long
before we got married, I once told Kibache that I would go on a date with her if she brought me a set of Dia
Diamonds. To be honest, it was just an excuse to turn down his persistent advances, but he took it to heart and
set off on a journey to find the diamonds.

203905.en:
When Kibache returned from his trip, he said, ''I didn't find the gem, but instead I found a phantom beast. He
couldn't find the gemstone, but he found a rare animal instead. And the one who took me to see him was his
partner, Ryuta, the red dragon. He said, ''I'll give it to you as a present! Ryuuta got angry and said,
''Don't treat it like an object! Ryuuta got angry and they had a big fight. Ryuuta was so relieved to see him like
that. After that, the three of us started playing together, and before I knew it, we were married. If she
wanted to fulfill the Promise of the Day, she should have brought it herself.

203909.en:
Whenever I come home after an adventure, he always tells me about his adventures. This time it's about
me and his promised jewel, the Daredire. I'm excited to see what kind of adventure we had.

203910.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>I can't wait for Kibache and Ryuta to
come back.

203911.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>My master has gone on another
adventure. I'm sure she'll be fine
since she's with me, but I'm worried.

204071.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>You're a good shopper, aren't you? I'm
going to end up making the merchant
cry.<bw_break>

204072.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Oh, come on. Don't be stingy. But I
like you. I'll sell it to you at a
friend's price.<bw_break>

204093.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Thanks for the tip, man!I can't let
this happen! I gotta go see him right
now and let him know I'm alive too!

204272.en:
I always do reckless things, but this
time I have a bad feeling about it.
Please, I'm counting on you.

204273.en:
I see...Princess Ulta, I see. As you may already know, since the death of Her Majesty, the Prime Minister,
Guryan Rush, has been in charge of the Empire. I can't say it out loud, but Princess Ulta, the orphaned daughter
of former Emperor Ja Kuba, is not well-liked by the people. The eccentric princess is a misanthrope.
With the exception of Lord Guryan Rush, she refuses to associate with anyone. She's holed up in the throne
room, and when she needs to go outside, she sends her caretaker, the Demon Goddess Machine, out on errands.
Yes, that's right. Princess Ulta's demonic machine might be authorized to issue Entry Permits. You can sometimes
find them in the Imperial City, so you should look around the plaza. That's about all I can tell you. It was a
good pogbattle. I look forward to our rematch!

204274.en:
<pc> explained that he wanted
an Entry Permit to have an audience
with Princess Ulta.

204281.en:
We are a royal tailor. I had received an order directly from Guryan Rush. I was surprised to find that even the
head pen researcher is missing! It's a pity, because it was a design of my heart, with its vivid red and green
colors. We have no choice but to make up for this disappointment with Princess Ulta's coronation gown. We'll
make her the most gorgeous and spectacular one!

Perhaps it's because the passages right there are convenient to go to and from the lower levels, but
sometimes people like you walk through them. However, you can rest assured that the Depository's security is top
notch. If you need anything, please come to the front of the counter.

204399.en:
I'm sorry for being so upset. But so are all the people of Gateria. He's a demon in human form. How's it coming?
Did you get it on tape? Make sure to record the fact that there are a lot of people who hate him.

204826.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>If I can't get the lenses, I may have
to give up what I want to make with
junk. Sigh.

234580.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>I never thought Ryuuta would grow so
big. As expected, we'll have to move.

234582.en:
Oh, it's been a while. My master went on an adventure right after he came back. He doesn't even know what people
are up to.

234584.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Well, I don't know what you're talking
about, but I'm asking you to give up
Deirdre. Is that what you're saying?<bw_break>

234586.en:
You once believed my hunch and went to Burning Lava Cave to help Kibache and the others. If you say that you need
the Dare Diamond, then I think it must be really important. I hope you will take good care of this special gem
that connects me with my master Kibache and my best friend Ryuta.

234588.en:
The Dare Diamond is a special jewel that connects me, my master Kibache, and my best friend Ryuta, and I hope
you will take good care of it.

234590.en:
Would you tell Laraconea about De
Adaia?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

234592.en:
<pc> told Laraconea that he
would need the Deedia to cleanse the
monster after 3000 years.

234596.en:
Now that we have the Deadia Shard and
the Black Curse vase, let's get back
to Sage Celedine.

234598.en:
Next, let's look for the Black Curse
vase needed to purify Shadow of Zedra.

244257.en:
We had to move because my master partner couldn't get into the capital anymore. I think the new location is
in the eastern part of the capital. I think I'll go check it out next time.
